sen.j: 神宮道（じんぐうみち）は京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Jingumichi is one of the south and north street in Kyoto City.
Jingumichi is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.
Jingumichi is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安神宮應天門から南へ大鳥居をくぐり、三条通と交差して知恩院山門、円山公園 (京都府)まで。
sen.e: It runs from Oten Gate of Heian Jingu Shrine to south and goes through the big gate, and it crosses with Sanjo-dori Street and goes to Chion-in Temple and Maruyama Park (Kyoto Prefecture).
It runs from Oten Gate of Heian Jingu Shrine southward, running through the big gate, and crosses with Sanjo-dori Street and goes to Chion-in Temple and Maruyama Park (Kyoto Prefecture).
It runs from Oten-mon Gate of Heian-jingu Shrine southward, running through the big gate, and crosses with Sanjo-dori Street and goes to Chion-in Temple and Maruyama Park (Kyoto Prefecture).
sen.cmt: Oten-mon Gate, Heian-jingu Shrine としました。

sen.j: 東山 (京都府)の観光地を結ぶため観光客が多い。
sen.e: There are many tourist because it connects to sightseeing area at Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).
There are many tourist because it connects to sightseeing areas in Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).
There are many tourist because it connects to sightseeing areas in Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.e: National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto
National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto
National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto

sen.j: 華頂女子中学校・高等学校
sen.e: Kacho Girls' Junior & Senior High School

sen.j: 四条河原町、京都駅方面への京都市営バス路線が三条通以北で設定されている。
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus installs routes to north from Sanjo-dori Street toward to Shijo-Kawaramachi and Kyoto Station direction.
Kyoto City Bus has installed northbound routes from Sanjo-dori Street toward Shijo-Kawaramachi and Kyoto Station.
Kyoto City Bus has installed northbound routes from Sanjo-dori Street toward Shijo-Kawaramachi and Kyoto Station.
